title: India proposes strict rules to label AI content citing growing risks
description: India's government on Wednesday proposed that artificial intelligence and social media firms should clearly label AI-generated content to tackle the spread of deepfake and misinformation, prompted by similar moves by the European Union and China.

BENGALURU (Reuters) -India's government on Wednesday proposed new legal obligations for artificial intelligence and social media firms to tackle a growing proliferation of deepfakes online, by mandating them to label such content as AI-generated.

title: 1,480 apprentices trained in AI roles under NAPS
description: The Skilling for AI Readiness (SOAR) program is fostering artificial intelligence (AI) driven education and skill development.
content: New Delhi [India], October 22 (ANI): A total of 1,480 apprentices have been trained in AI-focused roles like AI Data Engineer and Machine Learning Engineer under the National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS-2) between FY 2022-23 and FY 2025-26,... [3048 chars]

title: Elon Musk says AI will take every job and humans will be free to grow vegetables
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has claimed that Artificial Intelligence (AI) and robots will take over all jobs in the future. However, he insists that humans won’t actually need to work and can grow vegetables if they wish to.
